location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Public Department, Bombay to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is requesting the Resident's opinion on the amount of cargo the owners of the Duncanhave forfeited, as a result of conveying an urgent packet to the Bombay Presidency.Enclosed with the letter is a copy of a letter from J J Cross, Supra Cargo of the Duncan to Francis Warden, dated 14 July 1815. The letter explains that the author is not in a position to provide a suitable estimate of the cost of expediting the Duncan'sjourney to Bombay.
